text: The 2015 Biathlon Junior World Championships was held in Raubichi-Minsk, Belarus from February 18 to February 24, 2015. There was a total of 16 competitions: sprint, pursuit, individual, and relay races for men and women.Чемпионат мира по биатлону среди юношей и юниоров-2015 в Беларуси ==Schedule== All times are local (UTC+3). {| class="wikitable" |- !
